actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act so as to gradually increase and ultimately remove the limitation upon the amount of outside income which an individual may earn while receiving benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases and removes by January 1, 1977, the limitation upon the amount of outside income which an individual may earn while receiving benefits under Title II (OASDI) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act so as to gradually increase and ultimately remove the limitation upon the amount of outside income which an individual may earn while receiving benefits thereunder.
